thomson_scattering/midplane.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: thomson_scattering/midplane
IDS: thomson_scattering
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 1
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 2
PARENT_CONTAINER: thomson_scattering
FIELD_NAME: midplane
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: thomson_scattering -> midplane

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Choice of midplane definition for the mapping of measurements on an equilibrium. Indicate the IMAS URI of the used equilibrium IDS in the ids_properties/provenance section.

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[thomson_scattering]: Thomson scattering diagnostic

FIELD_NAME: delta_position
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True

thomson_scattering/channel/distance_sepa.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: thomson_scattering/channel/distance_separatrix_midplane
IDS: thomson_scattering
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: thomson_scattering/channel
FIELD_NAME: distance_separatrix_midplane
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: thomson_scattering -> channel -> distance_separatrix_midplane

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Distance between the measurement position and the separatrix, mapped along flux surfaces to the outboard midplane, in the major radius direction. Positive value means the measurement is outside of the separatrix.

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[thomson_scattering]: Thomson scattering diagnostic
CONTAINER[thomson_scattering/channel]: Set of channels (lines-of-sight)

CONTAINER[thomson_scattering/channel/distance_separatrix_midplane]: Distance between the measurement position and the separatrix, mapped along flux surfaces to the outboard midplane, in the major radius direction. Positive value means the measurement is outside of the separatrix.
